content.prompt: If a therapist were using counterconditioning techniques to alleviate a patient’s intense fear of heights, they would need to do which of the following?

choices.label: Make sure the patient does not experience any stress during therapy.
Ensure that the patient is informed of the therapeutic procedures that will be utilized.
Have an IRB review their plan for therapy.
Involve the patient’s family in discussing the progress made during the therapy sessions.

skill.text: 2.D: Evaluate whether a psychological research scenario followed appropriate ethical procedures.
